How was the synthetic VHH phage library: By increasing the number of glycosylation sites.
By using only short CDR3 lengths.
What is a key structural advantage of na: Nanobodies are smaller and can access sterically inaccessible epitopes.
Nanobodies have a higher molecular weight, allowing for stronger binding.
Nanobodies contain multiple heavy and light chains for increased stability.
Nanobodies have a longer half-life in the bloodstream than conventional antibodies.
What potential advantage do VHH-huFc ant: They offer stability, manufacturability, and epitope targeting advantages.
They have a higher affinity for the ACE2 receptor.
They require fewer rounds of biopanning for selection.
They are less likely to induce escape mutants.
What was the purpose of the final round: To enrich for therapeutically relevant binders against the RBD.
To identify nanobodies that bind to the full-length spike protein.
To test the binding affinity of nanobodies against the ACE2 receptor.
To evaluate the solubility and stability of selected nanobodies.
